LanguageData.medieval_surg_washpan.label: 수술용 세면대
LanguageData.medieval_surg_washpan.description: The most simple device to keep your doctors hands clean. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.medieval_surg_washpan_Blueprint.label: wash pan (청사진)
LanguageData.medieval_surg_washpan_Frame.label: wash pan (건설 중)
LanguageData.medieval_surg_washpan_Frame.description: The most simple device to keep your doctors hands clean. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.medieval_surg_instruments.label: 조잡한 수술도구함
LanguageData.medieval_surg_instruments.description: The fear of an operation with these instruments will speed up the recovery of your colonists. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.medieval_surg_instruments_Frame.label: crude surgery instruments (건설 중)
LanguageData.medieval_surg_instruments_Frame.descript: The fear of an operation with these instruments will speed up the recovery of your colonists. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.medieval_surg_lamp.label: 수술 조명
LanguageData.medieval_surg_lamp.description: "Let there be light", and the doctor suddenly realized he was amputating the healthy leg. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.medieval_surg_lamp_Blueprint.label: surgery lamp (청사진)
LanguageData.medieval_surg_lamp_Frame.label: surgery lamp (건설 중)
LanguageData.medieval_surg_lamp_Frame.description: "Let there be light", and the doctor suddenly realized he was amputating the healthy leg. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.industrial_surg_instruments.label: 전문 수술 도구함
LanguageData.industrial_surg_instruments.description: These instruments still look scary, but will not affect your treatment chances. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.industrial_surg_instruments_Frame.label: professional surgery instruments (건설 중)
LanguageData.industrial_surg_instruments_Frame.descri: These instruments still look scary, but will not affect your treatment chances. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.industrial_surg_lamp.label: 전문 수술 조명
LanguageData.industrial_surg_lamp.description: Shining a light on things gets a whole new meaning if you are standing over an open body during an operation. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.industrial_surg_lamp_Blueprint.label: surgery lamp (청사진)
LanguageData.industrial_surg_lamp_Frame.label: surgery lamp (건설 중)
LanguageData.industrial_surg_lamp_Frame.description: Shining a light on things gets a whole new meaning if you are standing over an open body during an operation. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.space_surg_instruments.label: 수술용 플라즈마 절단기
LanguageData.space_surg_instruments.description: If i use the 플라즈마 cutter here this should work. Sounds not very convincing, but the patient will feel no pain. Atleast thats what the advertisment says. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.space_surg_instruments_Blueprint.label: 플라즈마 cutter (청사진)
LanguageData.space_surg_instruments_Frame.label: 플라즈마 cutter (건설 중)
LanguageData.space_surg_instruments_Frame.description: If i use the 플라즈마 cutter here this should work. Sounds not very convincing, but the patient will feel no pain. Atleast thats what the advertisment says. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.space_surg_lamp.label: 수술용 플라즈마 조명
LanguageData.space_surg_lamp.description: The newest advacement in surgery technologie, literally a floating ball of light. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
LanguageData.space_surg_lamp_Blueprint.label: 플라즈마 ball lamp (청사진)

LanguageData.space_surg_lamp_Frame.description: The newest advacement in surgery technologie, literally a floating ball of light. Needs to be placed adjacent to a bed. One bed can be linked to only one of the same kind, but multiple beds can use the same one.
